sections.heading: Dogs; collarless; who deemed owner
sections.text: Every person who shall harbor about his or her premises a collarless dog for the space of ten days shall be taken and held as the owner, and shall be liable for all damages which such dog shall commit.SourceLaws 1877, ยง 6, p. 157;R.S.1913, ยง 177;C.S.1922, ยง 174;C.S
